seed_pair.target: Did they want to develop a new approach?
No they wanted to keep doing it the same way.
seed_pair.known: No querían continuar haciéndolo de la misma manera.

seed_pair.target: Yes they thought it could be done more efficiently.
seed_pair.known: Sí pensaban que podría hacerse más eficientemente.

seed_pair.target: They will be able to carry that suitcase.
seed_pair.known: Ellos van a poder llevar esa maleta.

seed_pair.target: They won't be able to break that window.
seed_pair.known: Ellos no van a poder romper esa ventana.

seed_pair.target: Will they be able to drive us home after the meal?
seed_pair.known: ¿Van a poder llevarnos a casa después de la comida?

seed_pair.target: Yes they'll be happy to help.
seed_pair.known: Sí van a estar contentos de ayudar.

seed_pair.target: They said that they were almost ready.
seed_pair.known: Ellos dijeron que estaban casi preparados.

seed_pair.target: No they have to catch the train themselves.
seed_pair.known: No ellos tienen que tomar el tren ellos mismos.
